links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''David Leslie Edward Hemmings''' ([[18 November|November 18]], [[1941]] - [[3 December|December 3]], [[2003]]) was a British actor. In later life, he was known for his distinctive eyebrows and booming voice, in films such as ''[[wikipedia:Gladiator (2000 film)|Gladiator]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Gangs of New York|Gangs of New York]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen (film)|The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen]]''. 

In his youth, however, he was a boy soprano, and at the age of 14, he provided the voice of [[Bergil]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|the 1956 radio series]] of ''The Lord of the Rings''.
